newsitem.title: CHINA: China interbank market rates (CHIBOR) mixed.
newsitem.headline: China interbank market rates (CHIBOR) mixed.

text.p: Following is the China Interbank Offered Rate (CHIBOR) for Thursday, issued by the official Xinhua news agency on behalf of the People's Bank of China, the central bank.
The figures represent weighted averages and not closing prices and they are annual percentage rates.
The central bank does not post volumes.
Traders said market sentiment continued to be weak after the rates fell sharply on Wednesday on talk that the central bank would shortly cut bank interest rates.
"The rates are likely to continue to fall but room for losses will be limited because the negative impact of the cut has been factored in," said one trader.

"The room for further losses will depend on the level of the interest rate cuts," said a second trader. Some traders said the cut would be announced on Friday, with the deposit interest rate cut by 1.5 percent and loan rate by 1.2 percent.
